General.Name: Jiangsu Flowers King
General.Description: Flower KingEco-Engineering Inc. operates as an ecological engineering construction company in China. The company undertakes landscape planning and design, municipal parks and square scenic design, residential and business district landscape design, commercial street, and comprehensive environmental renovation, etc. It is also involved in the public green space development, urban landscape, scenic area and theme park planning, as well as leisure resort, and residential community and commercial development projects. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Danyang, China.
General.Address: No. 88, South Second Ring Road, Danyang, China, 212300
